body:
Thanks to @eugeneswalker for noticing that this is completely broken. I'm not sure how long it's been broken for, but adding `output=str` fixes the issue.

Also added the latest version while I was at it. Successfully builds on macOS 10.15.3 with Clang 11.0.0 and Python 3.7.6.
